item.title: Simplifying MVI Architecture in Kotlin: A Powerful Helper Class
item.author: me@codeskraps.com (codeskraps)
item.description: Model-View-Intent (MVI) is a powerful architectural pattern for building user interfaces, especially in Android development. In this post, we’ll explore a helper class that simplifies the implementation of MVI, making it easier to manage state, handle user intents, and emit actions in your application.
